Name: Hard Lemonade
Ingredients: 30 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and serve with straws.
Review: Refreshing lemonade with a kick. Great for a hot afternoon.
History: Discovered in 2004 at Spring Street Natural Restaurant, New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Hard Lemonade contains 239 calories
